data.title: Weather, Season, Temperature
data.meta_description: Do you want to know when is the best time to visit Tobolsk in the year? Know about the monthly weather in Tobolsk, major seasons, and when to expect discounts on your stay in Tobolsk.
data.text:
Tobolsk Weather in January: With the air being damp (Humidity is 78%) and temperature being as low as -29℉, you can expect cold weather on your visit to Tobolsk in the month of January. The average temperature is 4℉. The average precipitation recorded around this time is 8.49 mm.

Tobolsk Weather in February-March: The temperature is cold throughout the months, the average temperature being 16℉. The air is slightly humid and expect to feel colder than usual. Unless you are very sure about the activities you want to do, this is not a very ideal time to visit Tobolsk. The average precipitation recorded around this time is 13.36 mm.

Tobolsk Weather in April: With an average temperature of 41℉ and slightly more humidity in the air, makes for cooler afternoons in Tobolsk. Make sure you carry light woollens as evening can get a bit chilly. This time period sees an average precipitation of 3.03 mm.

Tobolsk Weather in May: Warm and pleasant day time temperatures, coupled with right amount of dampness in the air makes May the best time to visit Tobolsk. The days are sunny, and the average temperature is 51℉ which is just perfect to put on those sneakers and go exploring Tobolsk. This time period sees an average precipitation of 4.27 mm.

Tobolsk Weather in June: With average humidity of 70%, temperatures sway between 46℉ to 86℉. Now this may cause a little discomfort, but we are sure not complaining! This weather is perfect to go sightseeing around the city of Tobolsk. This time period sees an average precipitation of 36.14 mm.

Tobolsk Weather in July-August: The highest temperature recorded is 86℉ which would make you want to run to the nearest café to down a glass of chilled drink, but the moderate humidity of 75% makes this an excellent time to visit Tobolsk. This time period sees an average precipitation of 25.05 mm.

Tobolsk Weather in September-October: The air is moderately humid with average humidity being 78%. The temperature ranges between 9℉ to 72℉ and it is still cold in Tobolsk. The high humidity in the air makes it feel colder, although the average temperature is 43℉. The average precipitation recorded around this time is 7.91 mm.
